answers.answer: Do you have gestational diabetes? Or is the ice cream made with unpasteurized milk? If not then not a worry. If yes to either then one slip should be just fine. ;)
Not diabetic but not sure on the pasteurised! This wot worried me :( but it was in a resturaunt not an ice cream van....
Then if it's at a restraunt then it should be pasteurized milk. I wouldn't stress it.  :)
Thanx :) I dunno y It didt click b4! I turn down whippys from the van all the time (not that I want 2!) I just didt think of a Sunday being the same stuff!! Lol o well I just won't do it again!!

question: Omg I'm such a doughnut!! Just went 4 dinner & had an ice cream Sunday without thinking about it! Then I thought o crap!! This whippy ice cream :(( surly 1 won't hurt.....right?! ... :(
title: duh!!
